20 #include "config.h"
21 
22 #include <stdlib.h>
23 #include <math.h>
24 #include <limits.h>
25 #ifdef HAVE_COMPLEX_H
26 #include <complex.h>
27 #endif
28 
29 #include "nfft3.h"
30 
31 #ifndef MAX
32 #define MAX(a,b) (((a)>(b))?(a):(b))
33 #endif
34 
44 static void construct(char * file, int N, int M)
45 {
46  int j; /* some variables */
47  double real;
48  double w;
49  double time,min_time,max_time,min_inh,max_inh;
50  mri_inh_3d_plan my_plan;
51  FILE *fp,*fout,*fi,*finh,*ftime;
52  int my_N[3],my_n[3];
53  int flags = PRE_PHI_HUT| PRE_PSI |MALLOC_X| MALLOC_F_HAT|
54  MALLOC_F| FFTW_INIT| FFT_OUT_OF_PLACE|
55  FFTW_MEASURE| FFTW_DESTROY_INPUT;
56 
57  double Ts;
58  double W;
59  int N3;
60  int m=2;
61  double sigma = 1.25;
62 
63  ftime=fopen("readout_time.dat","r");
64  finh=fopen("inh.dat","r");
65 
66  min_time=INT_MAX; max_time=INT_MIN;
67  for(j=0;j<M;j++)
68  {
69  fscanf(ftime,"%le ",&time);
70  if(time<min_time)
71  min_time = time;
72  if(time>max_time)
73  max_time = time;
74  }
75 
76  fclose(ftime);
77 
78  Ts=(min_time+max_time)/2.0;
79 
80  min_inh=INT_MAX; max_inh=INT_MIN;
81  for(j=0;j<N*N;j++)
82  {
83  fscanf(finh,"%le ",&w);
84  if(w<min_inh)
85  min_inh = w;
86  if(w>max_inh)
87  max_inh = w;
88  }
89  fclose(finh);
90 
91  N3=ceil((MAX(fabs(min_inh),fabs(max_inh))*(max_time-min_time)/2.0+m/(2*sigma))*4*sigma);
92 
93  W= MAX(fabs(min_inh),fabs(max_inh))/(0.5-((double)m)/N3);
94 
95  my_N[0]=N; my_n[0]=ceil(N*sigma);
96  my_N[1]=N; my_n[1]=ceil(N*sigma);
97  my_N[2]=N3; my_n[2]=ceil(N3*sigma);
98 
99  /* initialise nfft */
100  mri_inh_3d_init_guru(&my_plan, my_N, M, my_n, m, sigma, flags,
101  FFTW_MEASURE| FFTW_DESTROY_INPUT);
102 
103  ftime=fopen("readout_time.dat","r");
104  fp=fopen("knots.dat","r");
105 
106  for(j=0;j<my_plan.M_total;j++)
107  {
108  fscanf(fp,"%le %le",&my_plan.plan.x[3*j+0],&my_plan.plan.x[3*j+1]);
109  fscanf(ftime,"%le ",&my_plan.plan.x[3*j+2]);
110  my_plan.plan.x[3*j+2] = (my_plan.plan.x[3*j+2]-Ts)*W/N3;
111  }
112  fclose(fp);
113  fclose(ftime);
114 
115  finh=fopen("inh.dat","r");
116  for(j=0;j<N*N;j++)
117  {
118  fscanf(finh,"%le ",&my_plan.w[j]);
119  my_plan.w[j]/=W;
120  }
121  fclose(finh);
122 
123 
124  fi=fopen("input_f.dat","r");
125  for(j=0;j<N*N;j++)
126  {
127  fscanf(fi,"%le ",&real);
128  my_plan.f_hat[j] = real*cexp(2.0*_Complex_I*M_PI*Ts*my_plan.w[j]*W);
129  }
130 
131  if(my_plan.plan.flags & PRE_PSI)
132  nfft_precompute_psi(&my_plan.plan);
133 
134  mri_inh_3d_trafo(&my_plan);
135 
136  fout=fopen(file,"w");
137 
138  for(j=0;j<my_plan.M_total;j++)
139  {
140  fprintf(fout,"%le %le %le %le\n",my_plan.plan.x[3*j+0],my_plan.plan.x[3*j+1],creal(my_plan.f[j]),cimag(my_plan.f[j]));
141  }
142 
143  fclose(fout);
144 
145  mri_inh_3d_finalize(&my_plan);
146 }
147 
148 int main(int argc, char **argv)
149 {
150  if (argc <= 3) {
151  printf("usage: ./construct_data_inh_3d FILENAME N M\n");
152  return 1;
153  }
154 
155  construct(argv[1],atoi(argv[2]),atoi(argv[3]));
156 
157  return 1;
158 }
159 /* \} */

fftw_complex * f_hat
Fourier coefficients.
Definition: nfft3.h:527
mri_inh_3d_plan::f
fftw_complex * f
Samples.
Definition: nfft3.h:527
construct
static void construct(char *file, int N, int M)
construct
Definition: construct_data_inh_3d.c:44
mri_inh_3d_plan::M_total
NFFT_INT M_total
Total number of samples.
Definition: nfft3.h:527
mri_inh_3d_plan
Definition: nfft3.h:527
nfft3.h
nfft_plan::x
double * x
Nodes in time/spatial domain, size is doubles.
Definition: nfft3.h:194
nfft_plan::flags
unsigned flags
Flags for precomputation, (de)allocation, and FFTW usage, default setting is PRE_PHI_HUT | PRE_PSI | ...
Definition: nfft3.h:194
Generated on Tue Jun 2 2015 16:39:35 for NFFT by   1.8.5
